bug.short_desc: Better Email address validation is needed

long_desc.thetext: Currently, when trying to send emails from R4E, we only check if the email address is filled with some characters. There is a need to validate the the email address is in a correct format. We should introduce a validation method for this

On LINUX environment, the SMTP mail should validate the destination, otherwise, a ComponentObjectModelException: null address occurs. When testing on window environment, an empty address or an invalid address trigger a pop-up and no exception .
